oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Capt. Archibald D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA to his father written from Johnson's Island, Ohio
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Capt. A.D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, after his capture as a prisoner of war. He writes of having more room at Johnson's Island than at Washington, mentions that he contracted a severe cold while traveling, and requests; $20 in the form of a check so that he may purchase clothing he needs.
